body.name: Metal Shoe Rack Large Capacity 4 Rows 8 Tier 56-64 Pairs Shoes Boots Storage Organizer
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 53 mins
features: Large Capacity: The SMILHELTD Shoe Rack boasts 4 rows 8 tiers of spacious storage, providing ample space for up to 64 pairs of shoes and boots. This shoe tower unit measures 66.1"L x 49.2"H x 10.8"W, making it a perfect storage solution for households of all sizes. Each grid size:16.5"L*10.8"W*8.3"H

Durable Material: Made with high-quality, durable metal materials, this 4 rows 8 tiers shoe organizer is built to last and protect your footwear from damage. The metal frame ensures the shoe rack's stability and sturdiness, making it capable of supporting even the heaviest shoes and boots.

Customizable DIY Design: The Shoe Rack's DIY design allows you to customize its layout to suit your needs. Shoe shelf can be easily adjusted and assembled, whether you have a small or large shoe collection, this shoe rack's customizable design ensures that you can store all your footwear. Also you can separate this large shoe rack as 2 or 3 small shoe rack for different locations.

Versatile Use: This shoe tower unit is not only suitable for shoe storage but also perfect for organizing a variety of items, including bags, hats, and other accessories. The shoe rack's vertical free-standing unit shelf design is ideal for use in your entryways, hallways.

Excellent Customer Service: At SMILHELTD, we prioritize customer satisfaction and provide excellent customer service. We believe in our product's quality, and if you have any questions or concerns, our dedicated customer service team is always available to assist you.
body.description: SMILHELTD 4 Rows 8 Tier Shoe Rack SMILHELTD shoe rack's free-standing unit shelf design helps you save valuable floor space, while providing efficient and convenient storage for your shoes. This shoe tower unit is perfect for use in entryways, hallways, and closets in households of all sizes. This shoe tower unit is not only suitable for shoe storage but also perfect for organizing a variety of items, including bags, hats, and other accessories. The shoe rack's vertical free-standing unit shelf design is ideal for use in entryways, hallways, and closets, making it a versatile storage solution for different rooms in your home. Measuring 66.1"L x 49.2"H x 10.8"W, each grid measures 16.5"L x 10.8"W x 8.3"H, ensuring that there is enough space to accommodate different shoe sizes and styles.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Introducing the SMILHELTD 4 Rows 8 Tier Shoe Rack, the ultimate solution to your shoe storage needs. This shoe organizer is designed with 8 tiers of large capacity storage, offering ample space for 56-64 pairs of shoes and boots. Made with high-quality, durable metal materials, this shoe rack is built to last and protect your footwear from damage.

SMILHELTD is passionate about creating functional and stylish home organization solutions. Founded by a group of individuals with a shared love for organizing and design, we specializes in producing high-quality shoe racks, shelves and furniture pieces for homes of all sizes. The inspiration for SMILHELTD comes from a simple idea, a well-organized home can bring a sense of peace and calmness to life. With this in mind, we create products that are not only functional, but also visually appealing. SMILHELTD 4 Rows 8 Tier Shoe Rack SMILHELTD shoe rack's free-standing unit shelf design helps you save valuable floor space, while providing efficient and convenient storage for your shoes. This shoe tower unit is perfect for use in entryways, hallways, and closets in households of all sizes. This shoe tower unit is not only suitable for shoe storage but also perfect for organizing a variety of items, including bags, hats, and other accessories. The shoe rack's vertical free-standing unit shelf design is ideal for use in entryways, hallways, and closets, making it a versatile storage solution for different rooms in your home. Measuring 66.1"L x 49.2"H x 10.8"W, each grid measures 16.5"L x 10.8"W x 8.3"H, ensuring that there is enough space to accommodate different shoe sizes and styles.

The SMILHELTD 4 Rows 8 Tier Shoe Rack's DIY design allows you to customize its layout and size to suit your needs. The modular shoe shelves can be easily adjusted and assembled, giving you the freedom to create your own shoe storage system. Whether you have a small or large shoe collection, this shoe rack's customizable design ensures that you can efficiently store all your footwear.

Metal Pipes Made with high-quality, sturdy metal, this shoe organizer is built to last, ensuring that your shoes remain safe and secure. Plastic Connector Plastic connectors interlock the metal pipes to create a sturdy framework for shoe organization. 2 Pairs Per Grid Each grid measures 16.5"L x 10.8"W x 8.3"H, enough to hold 2 pairs shoes.

SMILHELTD Shoe Rack is a durable, spacious, and versatile shoe storage solution that is perfect for households of all sizes. With its compact and efficient design, you can say goodbye to cluttered and disorganized shoe collections and hello to a tidy and organized home.

reviews.reviewerName: Yes. A very I nice and ideal shoe Rack for a whole family. strong  and simple to assemble.
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Strong, spacious and simple to assemble shoe rack

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Way more sturdy than you think!
reviews.reviewText: It arrives in a zillion pieces that go together quite easily- even my mechanically challenged self was able to have it together in about 25 or 30 min. It is very lightweight and still oddly extremely sturdy despite that. It arrived with an off number of posts to outside pieces and lousy instructions so not sure what happened there but it went together so easily and it’s buildable so it’s easy to change its shape or add on etc. very happy with it, totally cleaned up the shoe clutter in my garage- 7 of us live here, so I’ll be buying another one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Holds many shoes.....
reviews.reviewText: I ordered 2 and they hold over 200 plus pairs of shoes. For the people within the household. There is still room. The rack are fairly easy to put together and now all shoes have a place. The pricing was fair and all parts were in the box and packaged so well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars All my shoes in one place
reviews.reviewText: My husband put this together in a day and now I have all my shoes in one place! It was missing a few horizontal bars but Amazon quickly sent a replacement that was perfect. It easily holds 4 shoes per space but I usually double up on flat sandals so I can fit more in. I use the top shelf for boots.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought 4 of these. They’re sturdy and you can make them in whatever configuration you want to work in whatever your space requires. I have a lot of shoes in need of these but they can work for anything. Each shelf is open spaced so I put cardboard or fabric over them if I don’t want things to fall through. Great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy ( ordered 2 already)
reviews.reviewText: Great sturdy shoe rack , easy to set up ! I have already ordered two . Stores up to 60 pairs of shoes . I would say read the directions because the end peace’s are different . Set up time max 1 hour .

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Got a box with no instructions - flimsy - returning
reviews.reviewText: It looks really bad. Flimsy parts in a box with no packing and no instructions. I opened the box and I close the box and shipping back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m happy! This was a great affordable buy for unboxed shoes and easy to assemble.
